about_the_game:
Tragedy strikes as the once magnificent entertainment and film company, Rotnic Entertainment, vanished in thin air. The ones inside trapped and restless to escape. In this demo, you'll be able to play Act 0 of the game. You'll learn where you are from, drive down a twisting road on a little bike and arrive at the forest.

The demo contains Act 0 and one minigame. You'll get a preview of the path system that comes with the full game and you'll get a feel of how the game works.

Venge is an indie game created by Ekrcoaster, this game contains 5 Acts (2 released currently) and plenty of unique minigames that build off of the main game. The game is replayable with multiple endings and sequences of events. Explore and battle creatures unlike you've ever seen. Each one different and each one challenging. This game learns as you play and adjusts itself accordingly to give you the best experience.

name: Venge Demo
